a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMeningococcalMenAConjugateVaccine2DosesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.MenA conjugate vaccine 2 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: MenA conjugate vaccine, 2-dose schedule (specific context where there is a compelling reason to vaccinate infants aged under 9 months) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMeningococcalMenAConjugateVaccine2DosesLogic

def.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

expression.name: Client's age is less than 3 months

def.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2

a:s.a:s: "One meningococcal primary series dose was administered"
"The latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 8 weeks ago"

operand.name: One meningococcal primary series dose was administered
The latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 8 weeks ago

a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination

def.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client\'s age is under 3 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 8 weeks ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client's age is under 3 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 8 weeks ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

def.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

"Client's age is more than or equal to 3 months"

def.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 8 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client with second meningococcal dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 8 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: "Two meningococcal primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Two meningococcal primary series doses were administered

def.name: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two meningococcal primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: 'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two meningococcal primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

expression.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. Two meningococcal primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.
